section.p: It takes a thief to catch a thief. During a thorough search of the ship, you discover a secret compartment behind the cook’s bunk where there is a large stash of stolen property.
‘My old tobacco pipe!’ cries the bosun. He rolls up his sleeves and advances menacingly on the cook. ‘You scurvy swab!’
Another sailor is appointed as cook, to general approval. For his many crimes both in and out of the galley, the cook is sent to feed the sharks.
